problem_text_cn: 如图是孔明设计用手电来测量某古城墙高度的示意图．点P处放一水平的平面镜,光线从点A出发经平面镜反射后刚好射到古城墙CD的顶端C处,已知AB⊥BD,CD⊥BD,且测得AB=6米,BP=9米,PD=15米,那么该古城墙的高度是()
problem_text_en: The picture is a schematic diagram of Kong Ming designed a flashlight to measure the height of an ancient city wall. A horizontal plane mirror is placed at point P. The light starts from point A and is reflected by the plane mirror and just hits the top C of the ancient city wall CD. It is known that AB ⊥ BD, CD ⊥ BD, and the measured AB = N_0, BP = N_1, PD = N_2, then the height of the ancient city wall is ()
raw_answer: 解:根据题意,容易得到△ABP∽△PDC．即CD:AB=PD:BP,∵AB=6米,BP=9米,PD=15米,∴CD=\frac{PD}{BP}×AB=10；那么该古城墙的高度是10米．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查相似三角形性质的应用．解题时关键是找出相似的三角形,然后根据对应边成比例列出方程,建立适当的数学模型来解决问题．
